programme.title: The Kitchen

programme.title: House of Knives
programme.sub-title: Welcome to the House of Knives
programme.desc: Host Scott Conant challenges six chefs to create dishes using a signature ingredient in hopes of impressing judges Marcus Samuelsson and Judy Joo. The winner will take the throne as the first ruler of the game, and one chef will be banished.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Katie Lee and chef Marcus Samuelsson hold nothing back as they aim to get Bobby Flay beat; they take no chances with Canada's own Alida Solomon and Italian-born Pasquale Cozzolino.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Chef Mika Leon brings the heat against chef Michael Bertozzi; chef Carla Hall and actor Jesse Tyler Ferguson decide who has what it takes to join their modern family for a food fight against Bobby Flay.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: The Kitchen's Sunny Anderson and Chef Giada De Laurentiis team up again to bring the heat into Bobby Flay's kitchen; the duo has recruited Indian expert Chef Paddy Rawal and Caribbean specialist Chef Trey Lamont to set Bobby's kitchen ablaze.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Chef Michael Voltaggio and actress Ellie Kemper bring the pain as chefs Travis McGinty and Suzanne Vizethann crack more than a few eggs in their quest to take down Bobby Flay.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
